publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4206 Shirley-Anne Somerville: Imprisonment of Binayek Sen—That the Parliament notes that 14 May 2009 marked the second anniversary of the arrest and imprisonment, without being brought to trial or allowed bail, of Binayak Sen, a medical doctor and human rights activist based in Chhattisgarh state in India; recognises that Amnesty International considers him to be a prisoner of conscience and his incarceration to be politically motivated and based on trumped-up charges; notes that Binayak Sen has devoted decades of his life to working with poor people in central India, and welcomes the work done by the Free Binayak Sen Campaign to condemn attempts to silence peaceful campaigns for justice and equality. Supported by: Dr Richard Simpson*

S3M-4206 Shirley-Anne Somerville: Imprisonment of Binayek Sen—That the Parliament notes that 14 May 2009 marked the second anniversary of the arrest and imprisonment, without being brought to trial or allowed bail, of Binayak Sen, a medical doctor and human rights activist based in Chhattisgarh state in India; recognises that Amnesty International considers him to be a prisoner of conscience and his incarceration to be politically motivated and based on trumped-up charges; notes that Binayak Sen has devoted decades of his life to working with poor people in central India, and welcomes the work done by the Free Binayak Sen Campaign to condemn attempts to silence peaceful campaigns for justice and equality. Supported by: Dr Richard Simpson, Jamie Hepburn*

S3M-4206 Imprisonment of Binayek Sen (lodged on 20 May 2009) Michael Matheson*, Ken Macintosh*, Kenneth Gibson*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Bill Kidd*, Robin Harper*, Pauline McNeill*, Sandra White*, Liam McArthur*, Bill Wilson*, Patricia Ferguson*, Aileen Cam pbell*, Rob Gibson*, Christina McKelvie*, Elaine Smith*, Ian McKee*
S3M-4206 Imprisonment of Binayek Sen (lodged on 20 May 2009) John Park*, Gil Paterson*
S3M-4206 Imprisonment of Binayek Sen (lodged on 20 May 2009) Cathy Peattie*, Stuart McMillan*
S3M-4206 Imprisonment of Binayek Sen (lodged on 20 May 2009) Alasdair Allan*

S3M-4206 Imprisonment of Binayek Sen (lodged on 20 May 2009) Malcolm Chisholm*, Elaine Murray*, Mike Pringle*, Helen Eadie*, Hugh Henry*, Cathy Jamieson*, Jackie Baillie*, Alison McInnes*, Bill Butler*, Dave Thompson*
S3M-4206 Imprisonment of Binayek Sen (lodged on 20 May 2009) Lewis Macdonald*
